hero.title: Welcome to Mar Store
hero.subtitle: Discover the latest fashion and style trends. Premium quality, incredible prices.

fashion.title: Fashion Clothing
fashion.description: Discover the latest trends in women's and men's fashion. Quality garments that adapt to your style.

accessories.title: Accessories
accessories.description: Complete your look with our exclusive accessories. From jewelry to designer bags.

footwear.title: Footwear
footwear.description: Find the perfect pair for every occasion. Comfort and style in every step.

shipping.title: Free Shipping
shipping.description: Enjoy free shipping on purchases over $50. Fast and secure delivery.

returns.title: Easy Returns
returns.description: 30 days for hassle-free returns. Your satisfaction is our priority.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team is available to help you anytime. Contact us whenever you need.

footer.description: Your fashion and style destination. Quality, elegance and the latest trends in one place.

forms.passwordHint: Minimum 8 characters, one uppercase, one lowercase and one number

validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 3 characters
validation.documentoInvalid: ID must contain only numbers (6-15 characters)
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Must contain at least one number
validation.fixErrors: Please fix the errors in the form

errors.registeredButLoginFailed: Registration successful, but there was an error signing in. Please sign in manually.
errors.fixErrors: Please fix the errors in the form

products.title: Our Products
products.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?

form.name: Product Name
form.uploadImagesHint: Click to select images (you can select multiple)

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.success: Message sent! We've received your inquiry and will respond soon. Check your email for our thank you message.
contact.error: Error sending message. Please try again.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind Mar Store and our passion for fashion

hero.title: Our Story
hero.description: Since 2020, Mar Store has been your trusted destination for fashion and style. We started with a dream: to make quality fashion accessible to everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Inspire confidence and style in every person through exceptional quality garments, unique designs, and unparalleled customer service. We believe fashion is a form of personal expression.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading fashion brand in Colombia, recognized for our innovation, sustainability, and commitment to our customers. We want every person to find their unique style with us.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We carefully select each product to ensure durable materials and impeccable finishes.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new trends and technologies to offer you the best of the fashion world.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to responsible practices that care for our planet and the communities around us.

customer.title: Customer First
customer.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. We're here to make your shopping experience exceptional.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A passionate team of professionals dedicated to bringing you the best fashion experience.

cta.title: Ready to explore?
cta.description: Discover our collection and find your unique style.

cart.title: My Cart
cart.emptyDescription: Add products to your cart to start shopping.
cart.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the cart?
